job.title: AI/ML - Backend Software Engineer, Speech & Language Technologies
job.description: ltbrgtltstronggtsummaryltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtthe aiml machine translation team is looking for exceptional software engineers passionate about delighting customers experience and pushing the envelope on machine learning artificial intelligence embedded and distributed computingltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtkey qualificationsltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtindepth development experience with ccltbrgtltbrgtexperience in objectoriented software design and programmingltbrgtltbrgtexperience in implementing services scalable to millions of usersltbrgtltbrgtfamiliarity with networking distributed systems and multithreaded programmingltbrgtltbrgtknowledge of machine learning techniques is a plusltbrgtltbrgtpassionate about creating phenomenal productsltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtdescriptionltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtyou will be a part of a team that is responsible for a wide variety of language technologies related research and development activities you will primarily be responsible for developing services that deliver our applications and technologies to millions of peopleltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtto succeed in this role you are a strong programmer and a creative problem solver who enjoys learning new thingsltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtyou will possess strong skills in objectoriented software design and programming you are passionate about developing new features maintaining existing code fixing bugs and contributing to overall system design you are a great teammate who thrives in a dynamic environment with rapidly changing prioritiesltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggteducation ampamp experienceltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtbs or ms in computer science or related field with years of industrial working experienceltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtrole number ltbrgtltbrgt
